data.eml:eml: Revision of the freshwater genus Atyaephyra (Crustacea, Decapoda, Atyidae) based on morphological and molecular data

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Christodoulou, Magdalini, Antoniou, Aglaia, Antonios Magoulas,, Athanasios Koukouras, (2012): Revision of the freshwater genus Atyaephyra (Crustacea, Decapoda, Atyidae) based on morphological and molecular data. ZooKeys 229: 53-110, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.229.3919, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.229.3919
